metadata.title: CVE-2024-26811 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: ksmbd:validate payload size in ipc response If installing malicious ksmbd-tools,ksmbd.mountd can return invalid ipc response to ksmbd kernel server. ksmbdshould validate payload size of ipc response from ksmbd.mountd to avoidmemory overrun or slab-out-of-bounds. This patch validate 3 ipc responsethat has payload.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
